sentences.sContent: The economy has become a troublesome issue for the Conservative Party.
sentences.sCn: 经济状况已成为保守党的一大难题。

sentences.sContent: ...it may be time-consuming and troublesome to search information online...

synos.tran: 麻烦的；讨厌的；使人苦恼的

words.tran: 捣乱者，闹事者；惹麻烦的人
故障检修工；解决纠纷者；解决麻烦问题的能手

trans.tranOther: A troublesome situation or issue is full of complicated problems or difficulties.
